
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">刚刚腌制的灯笼椒，生抽+醋腌制半个月或者一个月的时候就能吃，每次吃都是爆汁辣辣的越吃越上瘾，有人能懂吗，已经在咽口水了🙊 <br><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007C81JGgy1i0wrwv3zpcj30zk1bf78s.jpg" referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007C81JGgy1i0wrwv3zpcj30zk1bf78s.jpg"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007C81JGgy1i0wrwv3zpcj30zk1bf78s.jpg" referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007C81JGgy1i0wrwv3zpcj30zk1bf78s.jpg"></div><p></p>
